definition: B-mode ultrasonography/prenatal ultrasound scan/abbr. for B型超聲|B型超声[B xing2 chao1 sheng1]
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: If you want to determine the status of the fetus, at present only through the B-can be sure.
sentences.chinese: 如果要確定胎兒的狀況，目前只有透過B超才能肯定。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical value of B-Us-guided pericardiocentesis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討B超引導下心包穿刺診治心包積液的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the application of B ultrasonic examination on the diagnosis of clonorchiasis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討B超在華支睾吸蟲病診斷中的應用價值。

sentences.english: We contrasted the findings of cervical palpation and B-ultrasonography with the pathologic diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 將頸部觸診和B超檢查結果與術後病理診斷相對照。

sentences.english: To investigate the application of B-ultrasonic examination on the diagnosis of clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 探討B超在華支睾吸蟲病診斷中的應用價值。

sentences.english: To evaluate the clinical value of gall bladder wall change of virus hepatitis tested by B-ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 評價B超檢查膽囊壁改變在病毒性肝炎中的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: Conclusion B ultrasonic examination is valuable to the diagnosis of clonorchiasis.
sentences.chinese: 結論B超診斷華支睾吸蟲病具有重要的價值。

sentences.english: Phased array ultrasonic beam time -space characteristics affect the image quality directly.
sentences.chinese: 相控陣超聲波束的時空特性直接影響B超圖象的質量。

sentences.english: B sonography and MRI are excellent imaging modalities for accurately depicting prostatic utricle cyst.
sentences.chinese: 結論B超和MRI是診斷前列腺囊腫的重要方法。

sentences.english: B-Scan transducers are used to create an ultrasonic two-dimensional cross section view.
sentences.chinese: 醫用B超換能器用於產生二維超聲截面圖。

sentences.english: Especially a method for restoring B modeultrasonic tomograms is described.
sentences.chinese: 論文闡述了一種用於B超圖像恢復的方法。

sentences.english: All patients in this report have been diagnosed by B model ultrasonic and cholangiography by taking medium contrast orally or iv.
sentences.chinese: 本組病例均經B超診斷，口服或靜脈膽道造影檢查。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore the value of B-ultrasonographic diagnosis in suspiciously acute appendicitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究B超在疑似急性闌尾炎診斷中的價值。
